Scenario1-Invalid_Contract_ID.TC-1: Given Invalid Contract ID WHEN requesting to view Enrollee informarion THEN should not return any enrollee records

Scenario2-Invalid_Group_ID.TC-1: Given Invalid Group ID WHEN requesting to view Enrollee informarion  THEN should not return any enrollee records

Scenario3-Invalid_Division_ID.TC-1: Given Invalid Division ID WHEN requesting to view Enrollee informarion  THEN should not return any enrollee records

Scenario4-Empty_Division_ID.TC-1: Given Empty Division ID WHEN requesting to view Enrollee informarion  THEN Message should be displayed that Division ID is mandatory

Scenario5-Empty_Group_ID.TC-1: Given Empty Group ID WHEN requesting to view Enrollee informarion  THEN Message should be displayed that Group ID is mandatory

Scenario6-Empty_Contract_ID.TC-1: Given Empty Contract ID WHEN requesting to view Enrollee informarion  THEN Message should be displayed that Contract ID is mandatory

Scenario7-Invalid_ClientKey.TC-1: Given Invalid ClientKey WHEN requesting to view Enrollee informarion THEN Security Violation Message should be displayed
